segments.text: I can’t believe what I’m seeing in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is completely overflowing with water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s pouring down the front like a waterfall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman’s drying a plate and hasn’t noticed a thing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron’s probably getting wet from the splash.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There’s a huge puddle spreading on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now I see the kids behind her on the left.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy’s balanced on a stool that’s tipping over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s pulling out cookies from the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl’s standing there, hand outstretched for one.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They look so intent on their little mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a nice garden, all calm outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s shocking how unaware the mom seems.
segments.speaker: PAR
